Judul: FIRST PRINCIPLE APPROACH TO THE MODELING AND CONTROL OF ROTORCRAFT-BASED UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLES
Abstrak:
This dissertation presents a first principle approach to develop a low-order linear dynamic model of a small scale helicopter. The proposed physics-based approach alleviates much of the need for expensive and risky flight test associated with formal system indentification scheme. 
 

...
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Pembimbing: Prof. Said D. Jenie, Sc.D., Dr. Bambang Riyanto, dan Dr. Endra Joelianto
Kata Kunci: rotorcraft-based UAV, rotorcraft vehicle modeling, algebraic control, coefficient diagram method
